name: piddled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
piddle
(often of animals or babies) to urinate: The baby was handed to his dad and promptly piddled all over him. One of her dogs had come under the table and tried to piddle on my leg. Synonyms
pee
urinate
More examplesFewer examplesMale dogs frequently piddle everywhere.I didn't see him piddle on the beige carpet until it was too late. When he piddles on the mattress we only have to wash the cover.
